articles.title: Environmental tobacco smoke exposure and pelvic inflammatory disease: a cross-sectional analysis of serum cotinine.
articles.summary:
Here's a clear, concise summary focusing on the key finding:

Non-smoking women exposed to secondhand tobacco smoke showed increased risk of pelvic inflammatory disease, as measured by serum cotinine levels.

articles.title: Antibodies to watch in 2026.
articles.summary:
Here's a concise summary focusing on the key points:

A comprehensive review tracks the growing landscape of antibody therapeutics, highlighting increasing global development and diverse clinical pipelines across various medical indications.
